data.title: Eric Idle: The Spamalot Diaries
data.meta_description: Symphony Space is a performing arts center on the Upper West Side of Manhattan offering theater, film, literature, music, dance and family entertainment. Our mission is to connect art, ideas, and community through our programs and our commitment to literacy and education through the arts.
data.text:
Eric Idle takes the stage for a wickedly entertaining night of conversation, comedy, and more celebrating his new book. The Spamalot Diaries is an unforgettable look behind the curtain of the beloved musical and inside the mind of one of our most treasured performers. Stay tuned for the special guests who will be a part of this theatrical evening!

All full-price tickets of $42 or more include a copy of The Spamalot Diaries. There are a limited number of companion tickets available; these tickets are $25 and do not include a book. To purchase a companion ticket, add a standard ticket and a companion ticket to your cart. The companion ticket will be discounted at checkout. Note that companion tickets are only available to purchase with a full-price ticket and do not include a copy of the book.

There will not be a book signing at this event.
